short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The mummy only wakes up during Halloween to collect as much candy as possible! Reach down and grab for the yummy

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The mummy only wakes up during Halloween to collect as much candy as possible! Reach down and grab for the yummy treats as you try to collect enough points in order to complete each of the levels. Strategically use your candy to purchase upgrades, but do not over spend as you will not be able to complete all 20 levels.
